excerpt: Building your smart thermostatic radiator valve (TRV) is easy with Trinamic's open-source design. The TMC2300-THERMO-BOB allows you to develop a quiet and energy-efficient TRVs with sensorless homing. It uses the TMC2300 low voltage stepper motor driver with StealthChop2™ for silent motor operation. The TMC2300-THERMO-BOB has an onboard Goot stepper motor with 1.5V/1A and provides an interface to the Microchip PIC-IoT Board.Special FeaturesMicroPlyer™CoolStep™StealthChop2™StallGuard4™
